name: Astera the Sky Kingdom
description:
Arya is a rescue marine girl which gone to a island to rescue a castaway. After this she was told by the natives which a kingdom over the clouds exists and their queen is dying because of a demon's curse. So the jewel of the tribe starts to resonance with her lance given by her granpa and a mysterious flying boat came from the sky on the beach nearby. She became curious about the legend and decided to embark on a new fantastic adventure.

Commands: A and D to move. Space to jump.

City: Belém 

State: Pará

Country: Brazil

Team:

- Bruno Medeiros (Game Designer, Writer, Programmer, Level Designer, Concept Artist and 2D Artist)

- Luana Esquerdo (Character Artist and 2D Animator)

- Pietro Failache (Music Composer)
